name: Endless Ocean
description: This is a flying shooting game with a super cool red fighter appearance, a super realistic simulation of flying shooting experience, and super simple game controls, bringing you a different feeling. As a planet guardian, you need to drive your fighter jet on a mission, and the intruder's artillery fire will be fired at you. Players need to use the mouse to control the position of the fighter jet to avoid enemy attacks and launch attacks. Come and give it a try!
